mapper.select: SELECT ATT_RECORD_NO, USER_NO, TO_CHAR(ON_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS ON_TIME, TO_CHAR(OFF_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS OFF_TIME, LEAVE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(ON_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CURRDATE FROM ATTENDANCE_RECORD JOIN WORK_TYPE USING(LEAVE_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ATT_RECORD_NO, USER_NO, TO_CHAR(ON_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS ON_TIME, TO_CHAR(OFF_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS OFF_TIME, LEAVE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(ON_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CURRDATE FROM ATTENDANCE_RECORD JOIN WORK_TYPE USING(LEAVE_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND TO_CHAR(ON_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TODO (TODO_NO, USER_NO, TODO_CONTENT, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_TNO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{todoContent}, 'T')
mapper.select: SELECT TODO_CONTENT FROM TODO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'T'
SELECT LEAVE_TYPE, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM LEAVE L JOIN APPROVAL_DOC A USING(DOC_NO) JOIN WORK_TYPE USING(LEAVE_CODE) WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.DOC_WRITER = ${userNo} AND L.LEAVE_STATUS = '신청'

SELECT LEAVE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CURRDATE FROM ( SELECT DOC_WRITER, LEAVE_TYPE, LEAVE_CODE, START_DATE, END_DATE, LEAVE_STATUS, L.CREATE_DATE FROM LEAVE L JOIN APPROVAL_DOC A USING(DOC_NO) JOIN WORK_TYPE USING(LEAVE_CODE) WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND LEAVE_STATUS = '신청' AND #{currDate} >= START_DATE AND #{currDate} <= END_DATE AND A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATT_REQUEST (REF_ATNO, USER_NO, UPDATE_ON_TIME, UPDATE_OFF_TIME, UPDATE_CONTENT) VALUES(#{refAtno}, #{userNo}, TO_DATE(#{updateOnTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , TO_DATE(#{updateOffTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{updateContent})
mapper.select: SELECT ATT_RECORD_NO, TO_CHAR(ON_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WORK_DATE , TO_CHAR(ON_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS ON_TIME, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_ON_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS UPDATE_ON_TIME , TO_CHAR(OFF_TIME, 'HH24:MI') OFF_TIME, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_OFF_TIME, 'HH24:MI') UPDATE_OFF_TIME , UPDATE_CONTENT, LEAVE_CODE, LEAVE_TYPE, R.STATUS, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM ATT_REQUEST R JOIN ATTENDANCE_RECORD ON(REF_ATNO = ATT_RECORD_NO) JOIN WORK_TYPE USING (LEAVE_CODE) WHERE R.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT ATT_RECORD_NO, R.USER_NO, USER_NAME, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_CODE, TO_CHAR(ON_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WORK_DATE , TO_CHAR(ON_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS ON_TIME, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_ON_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS UPDATE_ON_TIME , TO_CHAR(OFF_TIME, 'HH24:MI') OFF_TIME, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_OFF_TIME, 'HH24:MI') UPDATE_OFF_TIME , UPDATE_CONTENT, LEAVE_CODE, LEAVE_TYPE, R.STATUS, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM ATT_REQUEST R JOIN ATTENDANCE_RECORD ON(REF_ATNO = ATT_RECORD_NO) JOIN WORK_TYPE USING (LEAVE_CODE) JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE R.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ATT_REQUEST SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REF_ATNO = #{refAtno} AND STATUS = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE_RECORD (ATT_RECORD_NO, USER_NO, ON_TIME, OFF_TIME, LEAVE_CODE) VALUES (SEQ_ATNO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo} , TO_DATE(#{onTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , TO_DATE(#{offTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , #{leaveCode})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATT_REQUEST WHERE STATUS = 'N'

SELECT USER_NO, USER_NAME, DEPT_NAME, TO_CHAR(ON_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') WORK_DATE, LEAVE_TYPE , TO_CHAR(ON_TIME,'HH24:MI') ON_TIME, TO_CHAR(OFF_TIME,'HH24:MI') OFF_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE_RECORD A JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) JOIN WORK_TYPE USING (LEAVE_CODE) WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y'
AND TO_CHAR(ON_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(ON_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{selectedDate}
ORDER BY DEPT_CODE
